Name: Emmanuel
description:
Emmanuel, 45, is married with 4 school-going children. Having been born in a humble family with little resources, he did not acquire education thus got involved in farming.

Thanks to the lenders who funded his previous loan, Emmanuel managed to complete his house and the family's livelihood has greatly improved.

Emmanuel has again approached UGAFODE for a loan of 1,200,000 UGX to buy fertilizers for his banana plantation so as to harvest quality output. He anticipates a good harvest that will attract buyers, thus earning income to support the family and also pay school fees for his children.

Emmanuel is so hopeful that his standards of living will improve steadily, and that he can educate his children with this funding. He appreciates the continued support.
